entry.title: Today in DeFi - Coinbase Cloud WaaS Live, Lukso L1 Live, NFT Loan, and more...
entry.summary: Coinbase Cloud WaaS Live Coinbase Cloud launches Wallet-as-a-Service on the Ethereum mainnet. Coinbase WaaS allows users to manage their wallets using a username & a password, and wallets created with WaaS are secured by multi-party computation (MPC) tech.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Inverse DBR Streaming, Lido Withdrawals UI Live, MEV-less Crosschain Swap, and more...
entry.summary: Inverse DBR Streaming Inverse introduces DBR Streaming, a new utility to INV tokens. Each staked INV will receive an automated, continual stream of DBR. DBRs are tradable borrowing rights used for Inverseâ€™s lending market FiRM Lido Withdrawals UI Live

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Lido V2 Live, crvUSD Live, Tornado Cash DAO Attack, and More...
Today in DeFi - Aevo Perpetuals, X2Y2 Fi and v3, DAI Borrowing, and more...
entry.summary: Aevo Perpetuals Ribbonâ€™s options protocol, Aevo, launches perpetual futures. Users are now able to trade both ETH Options and Perpetual contracts with up to 20x leverage. X2Y2 Fi and v3 Live NFT marketplace X2Y2 launches X2Y2 Fi and the v3 upgrade. The X2Y2 Fi is a platform for NFT loans, and v3 improves the platform UX with new features such as Gasless Loan Offer Cancellation, Optimized Gas Expenditure, and Auto Refinance.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - crvUSD UI Live, Kava v13 Live, Farming on LSDs, and more...
entry.summary: crvUSD UI Live Curve launches the UI for crvUSD. For now, sfrxETH is supported as collateral with stETH coming next. Kava 13 Live Kava 13 is now live. The upgrade speeds up transactions on the network and offers greater security, and brings a new bridge that facilitates the transfer of assets from Cosmos to protocols across Kava.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Reserve hyUSD, Origin OETH, ETH Staking, and more...
entry.summary: Reserve hyUSD Live Reserve Protocol launches hyUSD, a yield-bearing RToken backed by yield-bearing assets that provide exposure to fiat stablecoins and US treasuries through Convex and Flux Finance. Origin OETH Origin protocol launches Origin Ether (OETH)

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Lido V2 Live, Rook Transition, Advanced Swapping, and more...
entry.summary: Lido V2 Live Lido v2 is approved and launched. This upgrade mainly enables withdrawals & staking routers. Stakers can now directly unstake their ETH through Lido. Rook Transition Following the approval of KIP-44, Rook DAO is transitioning token governance to Incubator DAO, a new funding project to explore new concepts for the ROOK token.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Maker Spark Lend, MetaMask x PayPal, Lido V2 Coming, and More...
Today in DeFi - The 5 Phases of Maker Endgame, Uniswap on Bitcoin, MEV Profits Sharing, and more...
entry.summary: The 5 Phases of Maker Endgame Maker founder Ruin proposes a 5 phases Endgame plan that will rebrand MKR & DAI, enable SubDAOs, build AI tools, launch governance Participation Rewards, and eventually build Makerâ€™s own chain. Uniswap on Bitcoin Trustless Market

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Cosmos Neutron Live, zkLend Live on Starknet, Boosted LPing, and more...
entry.summary: Cosmos Neutron Live Neutron Chain, the first consumer chain Cosmosâ€™ Replicated Security, is now live. Built using Cosmos SDK, Neutron allows devs to launch smart contracts that can interoperate with other protocols and appchains. zkLend Live on Starknet

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Maker Spark Lend, Prime Protocol Mainnet, Trade to Earn, and more...
entry.summary: Maker Spark Lend Maker launched Spark Lend, its new lending product that allows users to lend/borrow ETH, stETH, DAI, and sDAI. Spark Lend is not available for users from the U.S. Prime Protocol Mainnet Prime Protocol is now live on Ethereum, Avalanche, Arbitrum One, and Moonbeam. Prime allows users to borrow cross-chain backed by their entire portfolio of cross-chain assets. Prime also launches an Early Adopter Program that rewards users with points.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Sui Mainnet, 1inch Fusion on Multichain, Lido V2 Coming, and More...
Today in DeFi - 1inch Fusion on Multichain, Yearn Dump Services, NFT Lending, and more...
entry.summary: 1inch Fusion on Multichain 1inch now provides Fusion Mode on five more chains including Optimism, Arbitrum, Avalanche, Fantom, and Gnosis Chain. Fusion Mode is 1inchâ€™s feature that enables users to swap tokens on various DEXes without paying network fees and at better rates.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Maverick Boosted Positions, Sui Mainnet Live, Cross-Margin Trading on Arbitrum, and more...
entry.summary: Maverick Boosted Positions Maverick AMM launches Boosted Positions that allow protocols to add incentives to any LP position on Maverick to build up liquidity. entry.summary: Uniswap Agora Uniswap launches Agora, a governance interface that allows delegates to build detailed profiles & delegators to easily find delegates who match their interests. entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Circle CCTP, Blur Lending, Set Deprecating, and More...
Today in DeFi - Google Cloud x Polygon Labs, Robinhood Connect, Leveraged Farming on Arbitrum, and more...
entry.summary: Google Cloud x Polygon Labs Google Cloud and Polygon Labs announced a multi-year strategic alliance to accelerate the adoption of core Polygon protocols, including Polygon PoS, Polygon Supernets, and Polygon zkEVM, with Google Cloud infrastructure and developer tools.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Vertex Live on Arbitrum, Avalanche Ethereum Native USDC Bridging, Cross-chain Liquid Staking, and more...
entry.summary: Vertex Live on Arbitrum Vertex is now live on Arbitrum, enabling cross-margin trading for spot and derivatives. Vertex combines an off-chain order book layered on top of an on-chain automated market maker on a decentralized, self-custodial exchange.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - LayerZero on Polygon zkEVM, Optimism Superchain Token List, Stake to Earn on Arbitrum, and more...
entry.summary: LayerZero on Polygon zkEVM Interoperability protocol LayerZero is now live on Polygon zkEVM, enabling devs to build on Polygon zkEVM and expand to 30+ supported chains with ease. Support Today in DeFi Today in DeFi is now a grantee on Gitcoin Grantsâ€™ latest round.
